thread.title: America WON'T Last Much Longer if Men Don't Do THIS | Glenn Beck at Fearless Army Roll Call 2.0
thread.title_full: America WON'T Last Much Longer if Men Don't Do THIS | Glenn Beck at Fearless Army Roll Call 2.0

author: Staff
title: America WON'T Last Much Longer if Men Don't Do THIS | Glenn Beck at Fearless Army Roll Call 2.0
text: Will America survive the 2024 election? As sides are being drawn, many men want to be the heroes that they believe will save this nation. But all true heroes, Glenn Beck says, have one thing in common: They didn't want to be heroes. They were afraid just like the rest of us. But they put aside that fear, surrendered to God, and did what was right. THAT is the kind of hero America needs: one of character, humility, and integrity. One who will stand for the TRUTH and teach it to his children, no matter what the culture says. In his speech at Jason Whitlock's "Fearless Army Roll Call 2.0" event, Glenn tells the stories of 2 heroes. One, George Washington, is well known. But many today don't know the true reason that men followed him into battle. The other, Raoul Wallenberg, few Americans have heard of. But his story of heroism during World War II brought Glenn to tears. Heroes: they’re all around us," Glenn declares. “This is OUR time. This is YOUR call.” To watch the ENTIRE Fearless Army Roll Call 2.0 event, sign up at https://BlazeTV.com/Glenn for exclusive access. Will America survive the 2024 election?
